fdInfo.des: 该框架所含词语描述的是某一身体部位产生的某种感觉，所含词元一般和表示产生感觉的身体部位的词语一起出现。

element.def: 该框架元素指身体体验所发生的具体身体位置，通常用主语表达。
体验者元素指某部位获得身体体验的人。
该框架元素是一个杂类，表示的是那些描述身体感知的各种状态特点的成分，是除了程度致因等以外的语义成分。
导致身体有所感受的事件或实体。
亚区是相对于身体部位来说的更加具体的感知区域，它总是和身体部位元素共现。

The Experiencer is the being who has a physical experience on some part of his  or her body, or internally. Often information about this frame element is incorporated as a possessive determiner into the constituent expressing the Body Part, in which case it is not tagged separately (from Body Part), as shown below: My legs hurt! Sometimes, however, this frame element is expressed as an External Argument in its own right:  I hurt all over! Here, the phrase all over can be considered a kind of generalized Body Part expression, and the pronoun I expresses the Experiencer independently. With nouns and adjectives in this frame, the separate expression of the Experiencer is more common: I have a pain in my leg.

This FE is the location on the body where the physical experience takes place, typically expressed as External Argument, often as PP complement: My legs are a little sore. I'm a little sore in my legs.
The Explanation describes the cause of the perception the body is experiencing.
